title: Okay Riot. I'm convinced you hate Aurelion Sol
body: Had a perfect opportunity for a water dragon themed skin. Gave them to GP, Cait, and Zoe.......... I'm convinced you guys have swept him under the rug like you did Aatrox for the longest time. Hopefully he'll get his skin soon enough. I'd love to see him get some love

replies.body:
Riot is saving it, in preparement to give ASol a water skin in league of his own that Riot thinks he absolutely deserves.

Riot would soon announce, with great passion, that there will be an Urban Legend Sewer Crocodile skin for ASol. 

I can hardly contain my excitement. I can't wait!

Completely agree with this sentiment. Not only has Aurelion Sol not received a skin since release, they have yet to release ANY in-game content related to the champion. Not to mention that ASol has been disabled in the game for DAYS now. If Yasuo had a bug, they would fix that champ REAL QUICK. ASol bug? Riot doesn't care a bit. I've played this champ since release date and it's been almost nothing but nerfs since then. The (relatively small) playerbase has succeeded on the champ in spite of Riot.
